meanings.sent1: The children relished the delicious ice cream.
meanings.sent2: She wore a relished smile after receiving the award.
meanings.sent3: The puppy relished the attention from its owner.
meanings.sent4: The artist's work was relished by art enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The warm sun on her face was a relished feeling.

meanings.definition: Took pleasure in or found satisfaction in.
meanings.sent1: He relished the victory in the game.
meanings.sent2: They relished the peaceful moment by the lake.
meanings.sent3: The chef relished creating new recipes in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: She relished the challenge of solving difficult puzzles.
meanings.sent5: The explorer relished the thrill of discovering new lands.
